description: Variation of condition 1 (approved drawings) and 5 (window details) of planning permission dated 29th February 2024 (RN:23/06144/FULL) for the Use of building as 4no. self-contained residential units (Use Class C3) with associated demolition and replacement of extensions within central courtyard and at roof level; Creation of third floor external terrace; Alterations/replacement of windows; Replacement of rear boundary wall with dwarf wall and metal railings; Installation of air-source heat pumps; and associated works. Namely, Amendments to main roof level, including installation of two new rooflights/smoke vents; Mews house roof, including installation of a rooflight with roof access hatch, and installation of area of concrete paving slabs; Palace Court elevation & lightwell, including four air bricks, new stair and acoustic louvres, and lowering of lightwell floor; Ossington Street elevation & lightwell, including cinstallation of four air bricks and works to downpipes; and central lightwell section/elevations, including the relocation of ASHP from the front lightwell, replacement of red brick on rear of mews with white painted render, replacement of windows at ground and first floor, and lowering of window cill to create fire door on south elevation.
